excerpt: "PostEra, a biotechnology company specializing in machine learning solutions for preclinical drug discovery, today announced a strategic partnership with Pfizer Inc. (NYSE: PFE) with the goal of accelerating small molecule drug discovery by developing a platform technology based on generative chemistry."
